name: part_012
file: tmp_【#雪花ラミィ3周年LIVE】ラミィの『大好き』詰め合わせ！Lamy＊Love♡Fest☆【雪花ラミィ⧸ホロライブ】 [215Bq5oo9Bw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Introduction of the 3rd Anniversary commemorative mug with a heart-shaped handle.
Promotion of the 'Cohabitation Girlfriend's Sweet Goodnight' situation voice recording.
Display of the complete 3rd Anniversary Full Set.
Details of the full set purchase bonuses, including a bonus voice and a bromide card.
Lamy's closing message, thanking her fans (Yukimin) for three years of support.

subtitles.original: 持ち手がハートになっていて、すっごく可愛いでしょ？
subtitles.english: The handle is shaped like a heart, isn't it super cute?

subtitles.original: 「大好きな君専用」っていうのは、
subtitles.english: "Exclusively for the one I love"...

subtitles.original: ラミィが君に使ってほしくて書いたんだからね！
subtitles.english: ...is because I wrote it wanting you to use it!

subtitles.original: そしてラミィとお揃い雪民スリッパ！
subtitles.english: And then, matching Yukimin slippers with Lamy!

subtitles.original: ラミィが履いてるのはだいふくのスリッパだけど、
subtitles.english: Lamy is wearing Daifuku slippers, but...

subtitles.original: 雪民さんは雪民さん専用のスリッパ。
subtitles.english: ...Yukimin-san has their own exclusive slippers.

subtitles.original: お揃いで仲良く歩こうね！
subtitles.english: Let's walk together as a matching pair!

subtitles.original: そして記念ボイスはシチュエーションボイス...
subtitles.english: And the anniversary voice is a situation voice...

subtitles.original: 「同棲彼女の甘々おやすみボイス」となっております！
subtitles.english: ..."Cohabitation Girlfriend's Sweet Goodnight Voice"!

subtitles.original: ラミィの抱き枕をぎゅーっと抱きながら聴いてね！
subtitles.english: Listen to it while hugging Lamy's dakimakura tight!

subtitles.original: そして活動3周年記念フルセットはこちら！
subtitles.english: And here is the 3rd Anniversary Full Set!

subtitles.original: 特典ボイスは「同棲彼女の甘々お目覚めボイス」となっています。
subtitles.english: The bonus voice is "Cohabitation Girlfriend's Sweet Wake-up Voice."

subtitles.original: 記念ボイスの続きのお話になってるので、こっちもぜひぜひ聴いてね！
subtitles.english: It's a continuation of the anniversary voice story, so please listen to this one too!

subtitles.original: そしてチェキ風ブロマイドカードは、
subtitles.english: And the cheki-style bromide card...

subtitles.original: 雪民さんに寝てる間に隠し撮りされちゃった...なラミィの1枚。
subtitles.english: ...is a photo of Lamy caught sleeping by a Yukimin-san.

subtitles.original: ちょっと恥ずかしいけど、飾ってくれると嬉しいな。
subtitles.english: It's a bit embarrassing, but I'd be happy if you displayed it.

subtitles.original: それでは、みんなここまで見てくれて本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: Well then, everyone, thank you so much for watching until the end!

subtitles.original: みんなが推してくれたから、雪花ラミィは3周年を迎えることができました。
subtitles.english: Because you all supported me, Yukihana Lamy was able to reach her 3rd anniversary.

subtitles.original: これからもたくさんたくさん頑張っていくので、みんな応援よろしくね！
subtitles.english: I'll keep working very, very hard from now on, so everyone, please keep supporting me!

subtitles.original: 雪民さん、大好き！ラブ、んーまっ、ちゅ！
subtitles.english: Yukimin-san, I love you! Love, *mwah*!
